A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was not Star Wars\, but instead felt like a marketing ploy to kids.  I feel like the only reason whh original heroes from OT were there wasn't to lure in the Star Wars fan base to make a quick buck out of them.  This is not just disrespectful to Star Wars.  In the words of Rian Johnson:  \"...this will be a lucrative Christmas\"
